## AuthorizationOptions.defaultStatusCodeForDeny property

Default HTTP status code when the final decision is `AuthorizationDecision.DENY`<!-- -->. If not set, default to 403

**Signature:**

```typescript
defaultStatusCodeForDeny?: number;
```
